Plot: When a boy wishes to be big at a magic wish machine, he wakes up the next morning and finds himself in an adult body.
Title: Big
Actors: Tom Hanks, Elizabeth Perkins, Robert Loggia, John Heard
tomatoConsensus: Refreshingly sweet and undeniably funny, Big is a showcase for Tom Hanks, who dives into his role and infuses it with charm and surprising poignancy.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 11 wins & 12 nominations.
